Minneapolis.Andrew R. McGill House:
The Andrew R. McGill House is a historic house located at 2203 Scudder Avenue in Saint Paul, Minnesota.


== Description and history ==
It is the Queen Anne style home of Governor Andrew Ryan McGill (served 1887–1889); designed in 1888 by W. A. Hunt. Andrew R. McGill, the son of Angeline (née Martin) and Charles McGill, was born in Saegertown, Pennsylvania, on February 19, 1840.
